topic.title: 求助！tor即使手动配置也无法启动，log报错
topic.body:
[2017-07-03 16:07:51,926] INFO     TorManager Connecting to Tor Controller 127.0.0.1:9051
[2017-07-03 16:07:52,930] INFO     TorManager Starting self-bundled Tor, due to Tor proxy port 127.0.0.1:9050 check error: 'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xd3 in position 28: ordinal not in range(128)
[2017-07-03 16:07:52,930] INFO     TorManager Starting Tor client tools/tor/tor.exe...
[2017-07-03 16:07:53,431] INFO     TorManager Connecting to Tor Controller 127.0.0.1:49051
[2017-07-03 16:07:54,433] ERROR    TorManager Error starting Tor client: UnicodeDecodeError: 'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xd3 in position 28: ordinal not in range(128) in TorManager.py line 90 > TorManager.py line 154 > TorManager.py line 190
请问这种情况应该怎么解决？
